title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1434/91 of 28 May 1991 concerning the stopping of fishing for mackerel by vessels flying the flag of Spain
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1434/91  of 28 May 1991  concerning the stopping of fishing for mackerel by vessels flying the flag of Spain
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
Catches of mackerel in the waters of ICES divisions II (excluding EC zone) V b (EC zone), VI, VII, VIII a, b, d, e, XII, XIV by vessels flying the flag of Spain or registered in Spain are deemed to have exhausted the quota allocated to Spain  for 1991.
Fishing for mackerel in the waters of ICES divisions II (excluding EC zone), V b (EC zone), VI, VII, VIII a, b, d, e, XII, XIV by vessels flying the flag of Spain or registered in Spain is prohibited, as well as the retention on board, the transhipment  and the landing of such stock captured by the abovementioned vessels after the date of entry into force of this Regulation.  Article 2
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 May 1991. For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
